card.title: Creative Thinking Test
card.subtitle: yaratıcılığın sınırlarını ne kadar zorlayabiliyorsun?

landing.title: Before You Begin
landing.subtitle: Answer honestly — this test is for your self-discovery, not for judgment.
landing.description: Be as genuine as possible. Your responses are not stored or shared — they're only used to calculate your result.
landing.reminder: You'll have 10 minutes to answer 20 questions. Take a deep breath and focus — this is your moment of reflection.

calculating.title: Analyzing your results...
calculating.subtitle: Our AI is evaluating your responses. This will take a few seconds...

warnings.leave_page: If you leave this page, your current test progress will be lost. Continue?

excellent.title: Creative Thinker – The Innovative Mind
excellent.summary: Your creative thinking abilities are exceptional. You consistently push boundaries, see connections others miss, and transform abstract ideas into innovative solutions.
insights: You excel at connecting disparate concepts to generate novel solutions
Your ability to see beyond immediate constraints fuels breakthrough innovation
You naturally challenge assumptions and explore unconventional paths

good.title: Creative Thinker – The Adaptive Innovator
good.summary: You have strong creative thinking skills with room for growth. You can generate original ideas and see alternative perspectives, though you sometimes default to familiar patterns.
insights: You demonstrate solid creative problem-solving abilities
Expanding your comfort zone will unlock greater creative potential
You benefit from seeking diverse perspectives to enhance your ideas

developing.title: Creative Thinker – The Emerging Innovator
developing.summary: Your creative thinking is developing. You may tend toward practical, proven solutions rather than exploring novel approaches. This isn't a limitation—it's an opportunity.
insights: Focus on generating multiple solutions before choosing one
Practice seeing problems from completely different angles
Embrace experimentation and view failures as learning opportunities

excellent.title: The Visionary Strategist
excellent.summary: You possess an exceptional ability to see the big picture, anticipate future trends, and formulate comprehensive plans. Your strategic foresight and analytical prowess make you a natural leader in complex environments.
insights: Exceptional foresight and long-term planning capabilities.
Mastery in identifying complex patterns and interconnections.
Highly analytical and data-driven decision-making.
Adept at translating vision into actionable strategies.
Inspires confidence and direction in teams.

good.title: The Adaptive Planner
good.summary: You demonstrate strong strategic thinking skills, capable of developing effective plans and adapting them to changing circumstances. Your balanced approach to analysis and execution allows you to navigate challenges with confidence.
insights: Solid ability to develop and adjust strategic plans.
Good at recognizing key patterns and their implications.
Makes well-reasoned decisions with a blend of analysis and intuition.
Effectively manages resources to achieve objectives.
Collaborates well to refine strategic approaches.

developing.title: The Emerging Strategist
developing.summary: You are developing your strategic thinking abilities, showing potential in understanding broader contexts and making informed decisions. Focusing on structured analysis and long-term perspective will significantly enhance your impact.
insights: Growing awareness of the importance of long-term vision.
Beginning to identify patterns and their relevance.
Developing a more analytical approach to decision-making.
Learning to connect daily tasks with overarching goals.
Open to feedback for strategic improvement.

excellent.title: Time Master – The Efficient Organizer
excellent.summary: You demonstrate exceptional time management skills, effectively prioritizing tasks, planning ahead, and maximizing productivity. Your ability to balance multiple responsibilities while maintaining efficiency sets you apart as a true time master.
insights: Exceptional ability to prioritize tasks based on importance and urgency.
Mastery in time-blocking and scheduling techniques.
Highly efficient in minimizing time waste and distractions.
Adept at breaking down large projects into manageable steps.
Excellent at maintaining work-life balance through effective time management.

good.title: Time Manager – The Balanced Planner
good.summary: You show strong time management capabilities, with good planning skills and the ability to handle multiple tasks effectively. Your balanced approach allows you to maintain productivity while adapting to changing priorities.
insights: Solid ability to create and follow daily schedules.
Good at identifying and eliminating time-wasting activities.
Effective at setting realistic deadlines and meeting them.
